markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Archaeologist's Luck](/Feats.aspx?ID=1883) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Fortune" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=76" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 156 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Archaeologist](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=46)

**Frequency**
once per hour

**Prerequisites**
[Archaeologist Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1879)

**Trigger**
You fail a check against a trap, such as a [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) check to [Disable](/Actions.aspx?ID=69) the trap or a Reflex save to avoid its effects.

</column>

---

You are more than just skillful; your drive to find the secrets of the past manifests as a strange kind of luck. Reroll the failed check and use the new result.
name: Archaeologist's Luck
